action.primary: Cools the Blood and stops bleeding

indications: Hemoptysis, hematemesis, epistaxis, purpura from Heat in the Blood (can be used alone in a large dosage)

action.primary: Calms the fetus and prevents spontaneous abortion

indications: Restless fetus due to Accumulation of Heat (can be used alone)

action.primary: Clears Heat, cools the Blood and unblocks and facilitates the water pathways

indications: Dribbling or scanty urine due to Damp-Heat Pouring into the Bladder, dysuria, hematuria, gonorrhea, thirst (can be used alone)

action.primary: Cools the Blood and resolves toxicity

indications: Toxic sores, such as carbuncles, toxic swellings, erysipelas, back and shoulder furuncles and snakebites (apply the macerated fresh herb topically)

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with a weak Stomach and diarrhea.
Contraindicated for those with any disorder not caused by Blood Heat.
